description: The graph depicts the frequency of headlines mention in relevant Russian-language media. It uses regex expressions for requesting the words "Nazis", “rigidity”, “murder”, “tortures” in the Tableau worksheet. Timeframe: 01.01.2022 - 31.07.2022. Data source: GDELT.
chart_title: Frequency of headlines mentioning the “rigidity of Nazis” marker.
name: nazi-tableau-murder
